activities: Enciva LLC provides PostgreSQL and Oracle database hosting services to clients in over 45 countries worldwide.  Enciva LLC adheres to all data protection policies for the EU, EEA,  and/or Switzerland.  Our full Privacy Policy can be viewed at: http://www.enciva.com/privacy-policy.htm
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Clients have recourse at every level.  In addition to all applicable local, state, and federal laws and regulations,  payments and billing issues can be taken directly to our third party gateway providers. Encvia LLC will also cooperate and comply with EU DPAs and the Swiss FDPIC to investigate all unresolved complaints, regardless of the type of data involved.
